data.question: What is the empirical formula of AQNU-4?
What crystal system does AQNU-4 belong to?
What is the formula weight of AQNU-4?
What is the space group of AQNU-4?
What is the highest CO2 to CO conversion rate achieved by AQNU-4?
What solvent shows the highest CO2 to CO conversion rate with AQNU-4?
What is the role of the DTDA ligand in AQNU-4?
data.answer: The DTDA ligand captures light under illumination to form photogenerated electron–hole pairs.

data.question: Why does AQNU-4 show an obvious solvent dependence during the catalytic process?
data.answer: Because the framework is responsive to different solvent stimuli, reflected in the catalysis results.

data.question: How does the photocatalytic CO2 reduction reaction (CO2RR) proceed in AQNU-4?
data.answer: CO2 photoreduction over AQNU-4 proceeds through a COOH* intermediate, starting with the activation of CO2* at the Tb active center.

data.question: What makes AQNU-4 a good solvent-responsive MOF material?
data.answer: Its ability to show different catalytic results when the reaction is conducted in different solvents.
